snippet: Besides consecutive losses in the Rose Bowl, Wisconsin will cope with losses to its roster and coaching staff in the off-season.
abstract: Besides consecutive losses in the Rose Bowl, Wisconsin will cope with losses to its roster and coaching staff in the off-season.
lead_paragraph: PASADENA, Calif. - Wisconsin lost for the third time this season Monday evening. As painful as it was, it was equally fitting for a team that has now lost two consecutive Rose Bowls by a combined 9 points.

headline.main: Wisconsin Has More Than Bowl Loss to Worry About
